com.solidfire.client

Class HttpsRequestDispatcher

  • Object
    • HttpsRequestDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestDispatcher, Versionable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSecurity

    public class HttpsRequestDispatcher
extends Object
implements RequestDispatcher
    A request dispatcher for dispatching JSON-RPC encoded requests to an Element OS cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpsRequestDispatcher(URL endpoint)
      Create a dispatcher using no authentication.
      HttpsRequestDispatcher(URL endpoint, String username, String password)
      Create a dispatcher using HTTP basic authentication using the supplied username and password.
